course_title: Special Topics in Chemistry: Perspectives in Chemistry
class_notes: Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from May 26 - July 4, 2022. Apply online at studyabroad.emory.edu
course_description: A seminar for advanced students on topics of current interest in chemistry.
prerequisites: CHEM 204 or CHEM_OX 204 or CHEM 205 or CHEM_OX 205 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1342, Section #: 900, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: Dyer/Conticello, Status: Open
